results.title: Mesenchymal stem cell sheet transplantation combined with locally released simvastatin enhances bone formation in a rat tibia osteotomy model.
results.text_hl: Such MSC sheet with locally applied @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ might contribute to the treatment of @DISEASE_Fractures_Bone @DISEASE_MESH:D050723 @@@fractures@@@, bone delayed unions or @<m>DISEASE_Supraumbilical_midabdominal_raphe_and_facial_cavernous_hemangiomas</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C538144 @@@nonunions@@@ in clinical practice.

citations.NLM: Qi Y, Zhao T, Yan W, Xu K, Shi Z, Wang J. Mesenchymal stem cell sheet transplantation combined with locally released simvastatin enhances bone formation in a rat tibia osteotomy model. Cytotherapy. 2013 Jan;15(1):44-56. PMID: 23260085
